definitions.title: n. pr. 1. m.
definitions.body: Jabez, a man of the Calebites, 1Ch 4:9, 1Ch 4:9, 1Ch 4:10 (where interpr. as akin to [[עחב]]; on position of this family cf. Mey:Judenthum 118); LXX Igabhv A Iagbhv, Gabhv, GL Iabihv, Iabhl, Iabeiv.

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: in Judah, appar. near Bethlehem 1Ch 2:55 (cf. v:1Ch 2:54); LXX Gamev A Gabhv LXXL Iabiv.
